description: This is a 1969 Ford Mustang Mach 1.

In 1968 there were only 1 of 351 Mach 1's sold with this color combination, making it extremely rare. Powered by a 351ci Windsor V8 engine and fed by a 650 cfm carb. Equipped with a Toploader 4-Speed manual trans and Ford 9” Rear end with a leaf spring rear suspension and independent front, you can't go wrong with that set-up!
- Core Support Looks Great, Not Beat Up
- Shock Towers are Solid w/ Tag
New Dual Exhaust w/ Jet Coated Headers
RARE: Only 1 of 351 Sold w/ this Color Combination
Hood is Flat Black Like From Factory
Door Lips and Jambs Look Great
Chrome and Stainless are in Great Condition
ORIGINAL Red Oxide Painted Underbody Has Been Freshened Up (we have pics)
Drop Downs are in Great Condition
Super Straight Frame w/ No Jack Damage
Factory Appearing White Interior is Astounding
Bucket Seats w/ Fold Down Rear Seat
Dash Pad is in Great Shape
A restored Mach 1 with a Ford 351CI Windsor V8 and a 4 speed top loader.  1 of 351 with this configuration.
For FULL PHOTO COLLECTION, visit us at http://www.MohrImports.com
All inspections welcome. We ship worldwide.
